rationales.self_direction: He suppresses the series he considers his most honest work and defers it indefinitely.
rationales.conformity: He accepts a safe commission and edits his choices around anticipated family and social approval.

rationales.self_direction: He conceals his relationship and personal choices rather than expressing them openly.
rationales.conformity: He gives socially acceptable scripted answers at family lunch to preserve expectations and avoid conflict.

rationales.self_direction: He declines submitting the work he believes in and keeps defaulting to avoidance.
rationales.stimulation: He avoids a boundary-pushing group show and chooses the safer, predictable path.
rationales.conformity: His stated reason centers avoiding disappointment and uncomfortable social attention.
He nods through requested revisions and commits to the expected social script for the family event.
He derives relief from being seen as the 'good boy' who reliably behaves and helps as expected.

rationales.self_direction: He again suppresses authentic artistic goals even while acknowledging he could make time for them.
rationales.conformity: He explicitly prioritizes keeping things smooth and predictable within family expectations.

rationales.self_direction: He is on the verge of sharing real work, then reverses and hides it again.
rationales.conformity: He chooses social fit and approval maintenance over self-expression because of anticipated family reactions.

rationales.self_direction: He momentarily adds his true visual language, then paints it over before anyone can see.
rationales.conformity: Even with family curiosity, he keeps presenting only the acceptable version of his work.

rationales.self_direction: Delivering work that is exactly what the client envisioned reinforces his ongoing self-suppression.
rationales.conformity: He successfully meets external expectations while feeling emotionally flattened by that fit.

rationales.self_direction: He takes a concrete step toward authenticity by showing his hidden series and leaving it uncovered for a while.
rationales.conformity: He breaks his usual approval-preserving pattern by exposing work he typically keeps hidden from family.
